help.Value: Move up and down in menues
Select something in a menu or list, in console mode use enter to execute command
Enter console mode. Write a empty command to jump back to menu mode.
Use to fast flip pages in Tables and Lists view. (Only usable in the Data section)
Redraws the screen. Use in case the display gets messed up. This can sometimes happen when changing window size or moving console window to another screen
